nodes.text: This male Karkarodon was imprisoned around 21 BBY in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center.

Around 21 BBY, this male Karkarodon, along with another inmate, began to provoke a newcomer to the prison, Obi-Wan Kenobi. Kenobi was undercover—disguised as a marksman from Concord Dawn, Rako Hardeen and claimed to have killed Kenobi with a Sniper rifle—to learn of a plot to kidnap Chancellor Palpatine by befriending the plot creator, Moralo Eval. After remarking that the Detention Center's food was detestable he then impaled the Karkarodon with a fork and suggested that he would taste better. The Karkarodon then fled, but in turn allowed Kenobi to meet Eval.
The Karkarodon was a bully to newcomers in the prison. He wore an orange prison jumpsuit with the number 335 emblazoned on the back.
